Key Match Events: Sanju Samson hit a 26-ball 39 in his first innings for India in 7 months.
Shreyas Iyer scored a 44-ball 74 in India's chase of 184 in just 17.1 overs.
Samson and Iyer added an 84-run stand in just 47 balls.
Ravindra Jadeja hit a stunning 18-ball 45 not out to take India past the finish line in just 17.1 overs.
India hammered Sri Lanka by 7 wickets in the 2nd T20I.
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma lauded the middle-order for consistently stepping up.
Rohit Sharma praised Sanju Samson for making the most of his opportunity.
Rohit Sharma mentioned the importance of giving opportunities to talented players.
Rohit Sharma highlighted the contributions of Shreyas Iyer and Ravindra Jadeja.
